page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: There is only onr school in this area,Walton on Trent Church of England (Controlled) Primary School. There has been a school in the village since 1792.The present school is the third building.It is a modern, open-plan school which was finished in 1984. There are 75 pupils,divided into 4 groups,as there are no classrooms.The headteacher is Mr.Rowland Turner and there are three other teachers;Mrs. Margaret Daddley,Mrs.Helen Shacklock and Mrs.Jean Blackman. The pupils start school in the term before they are 5 years old,but only half-time for the first term.They stay at the school till they are 11 years old,then they transfer to the John Taylor Secondary School at Barton under Needwood.This is in Stafford- shire because the Derbyshire secondary
